name: Banana Bandit
description:
Expected play time: 10 minutes

It's time for a heist

You begin each heist with a single banana gun. Banana guns only fire once and then you're left with an empty banana peel. Toss the peel aside before grabbing another gun, but careful: peels are slippery.

Guards will drop banana guns if you shoot them while they're holding one.

Once you get your prize, escape the building to win.

Controls

Arrow keys: move, cursor select

Z: jump, OK

X: use item, back

Down+Z: jump down from one-way platforms

Esc: pause
